video.title: Horrid Henry
video.synopsis: To his family's frustration, Henry is skilled at making trouble, from babysitting pets in his bedroom to starting a shark panic at the swimming pool.

episodes.synopsis: Just as Henry's settled down to watch his hero Mutant Max, he's forced out of the house for a family walk in the countryside.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Hike

episodes.synopsis: Moody Margaret is moving in while her parents are away for a few days, and now Henry is up against someone even more horrid than he is.
episodes.title: Moody Margaret Moves In

episodes.synopsis: The latest craze is gizmo collecting -- not just any old gizmo, but the ones from the Sweet Tweet cereal boxes. And Henry has his eye on Peter's.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Hobby

episodes.synopsis: Mum is organizing the school fair and is on the hunt for old games and toys. Henry generously donates his Walkie-Talkie-Burpy-Slurpy-Teasy-Weasy Doll.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's School Fair

episodes.synopsis: It's Halloween, and Henry is looking forward to playing lots of tricks and being given lots of treats. But he's banned from leaving the house!
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Tricks and Treats

episodes.synopsis: Miss Battle-Axe is determined that no one -- not even Henry -- will spoil this year's sports day.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Sports Day

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's losing teeth, except for Henry. It's not fair, and something must be done. But Henry finds that it isn't so easy to trick the Tooth Fairy.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Tricks the Tooth Fairy

episodes.synopsis: Greasy Greta, the dinner lady, is rigorously enforcing the no-sweets-in-school rule by eating all the evidence! There's only one way to stop her.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Demon Dinner Lady

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas, and Stuck-Up Steve is set to get his usual huge pile of presents -- most of which Henry would really like to receive.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Henry knows how to deal with baby sitters. But when Rabid Rebecca turns up, Henry finds that his usual tactics just don't work.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Bogey Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: When Mr. Kill goes missing, Henry plays detective. His suspects include Dad, Perfect Peter and, of course, Moody Margaret!
episodes.title: Who Stole Mr. Kill?

episodes.synopsis: Another day, another swimming lesson. Henry needs to come up with something good to avoid his least favorite lesson of all time!
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Swimming Lesson

episodes.synopsis: It's take-your-child-to-work day, and Henry can't wait -- a whole day playing computer games, eating donuts and surfing the web! Or so he thinks.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Goes to Work

episodes.synopsis: Banned from Lazer Zap as a result of previous misdemeanors, Henry has to find another venue for his birthday party on short notice.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: A special night out at a posh restaurant with Rich Aunt Ruby and Stuck-Up Steve is exactly what Henry doesn't want.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Eats Out

episodes.synopsis: Henry's homemade time machine takes Peter back to the future to visit the Peter Museum. Peter is delighted -- he always knew he was special.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Mega-Mean Time Machine

episodes.synopsis: There's a chocolate mousse in the fridge with Henry's name on it, so he's outraged when he finds out he's not part of Mum and Dad's dinner plans.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Dinner Guests

episodes.synopsis: Henry's really looking forward to his school trip to the local ice cream factory. But they're closed, so the class goes to the museum instead.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's School Trip

episodes.synopsis: When Henry is low on money, Mum suggests that he earn some -- though selling Peter as a servant isn't quite what she had in mind.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Gets Rich Quick

episodes.synopsis: When Henry accidentally paints Peter blue, he's sent to his room for a very long time, and all his stuff is confiscated.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Horrid Revenge

episodes.synopsis: When Peter realizes that it sometimes pays to be horrid, he decides to be really, really horrid. But can he ever be as horrid as Henry?
episodes.title: Perfect Peter's Horrid Day

episodes.synopsis: Henry's plan to take a day off from school unravels when he finds out that everyone else is sick.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Sick Day

episodes.synopsis: When Henry manages to lock himself in the cellar with Peter, his first reaction is that it's just not fair. His second reaction is to find a way out.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry - Trapped

episodes.synopsis: Henry is out of sleepover options, until New Nick invites him over for what Henry assumes will be another great night of mayhem.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: Henry's only chance to see his favorite team play live is to win Best Player in a school football competition.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry the Football Fiend

episodes.synopsis: Mum and Dad drag Henry off for a spot of camping, but Henry's idea of a holiday isn't the same as everyone else's.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Holiday

episodes.synopsis: The school talent competition gives Henry a chance to show off what he can really do -- and get tickets to see the Killer Boy Rats as well!
episodes.title: Henry's Horrid Heroes

episodes.synopsis: A bad school report foils Henry's plan for a great night out at the funfair, until he comes up with the most cunning idea ever!
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Perfect Day

episodes.synopsis: Peter's party clown isn't everything that he seems, so Henry and Ralph decide to help him out a bit with his magic act.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday Peter

episodes.synopsis: It's time for the ultimate showdown as Henry and Margaret go head-to-head to prove which is best: the Purple Hand Gang or the Secret Club.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Secret Club

episodes.synopsis: It's injection day at school. Henry wants to be brave, especially in front of his classmates, but he just can't go through with it.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Injection

episodes.synopsis: Perfect Peter concocts a devious revenge scheme against his older brother with the help of the Best Boys Club.
episodes.title: Perfect Peter's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Henry has to think fast when Mum forbids him from putting his slime into this year's school time capsule.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's and the Time Capsule

episodes.synopsis: When Horrid Henry gets into trouble for the millionth time, he decides that the only solution is to run away to a better life.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Runs Away

episodes.synopsis: Breaking in new teachers isn't easy, but someone's got to do it -- and who better than Henry?
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's New Teacher

episodes.synopsis: Henry's career as a film director gets off to a shaky start -- but who would have guessed that he'd end up in a starring role?
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Hideo-Video

episodes.synopsis: Henry's got his heart set on some new shoes; Mum wants to buy trousers that fit. But a day out at the department store turns into the usual disaster.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's New Shoes

episodes.synopsis: While spending the weekend at Rich Aunt Ruby's house, Henry finds that there are spooky things happening in the attic.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Haunted House

episodes.synopsis: Ralph, Al and Bert are set on revenge when Henry's latest trick gets a bit out of hand, but Henry's convinced they'll never get him.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Underpants

episodes.synopsis: No one's more excited than Henry when the Queen comes to visit. But her visit doesn't turn out quite the way Henry imagined it.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Meets the Queen

episodes.synopsis: When Henry gets top marks on a computer test, everyone is delighted -- except Henry, who's not quite comfortable being at the head of the class.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Computer Whizz!

episodes.synopsis: Henry is the victim of the Fangmangler, a fearsome creature who comes out at night to eat little children -- especially little brothers.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Makes Some Money

episodes.synopsis: Henry as a page boy? Not a pretty sight. But he decides to make the most of it and help Prissy Polly and Pimply Paul enjoy their big day.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: It seems like a great idea to take Fang, Henry's hamster, to school for show-and-tell. But Henry finds that the headmaster is not always in control.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Horrid Hamster

episodes.synopsis: Dad takes Henry, Peter and their friends to the aquarium for a bit of fishy fun. As usual, Henry's after something else ...
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Visits the Aquarium

episodes.synopsis: Chores, chores, chores -- what a bore! But they must be done if Henry's going to get to play at Ralph's house.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Household Chores

episodes.synopsis: Henry would rather do karate than dance class. But Mum can't be persuaded, so Henry has to show her that karate can be just as beautiful as dancing.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Dance Class

episodes.synopsis: When Fluffy disappears, Peter is distraught and Henry is suspicious. Why is Margaret being so secretive, and what is she planning in her tree house?
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Where's Fluffy?

episodes.synopsis: No one believes in fairies, do they? Although if they did, it could be very useful -- and who better to use this information than Henry?
episodes.title: Horrid Henry and the Fairy Dance

episodes.synopsis: Henry's not happy about his homework assignment: to keep a diary of a day in his life. But then he realizes this is a chance to tell it like it is!
episodes.title: Horrid Henry's Diary

episodes.synopsis: Henry will stop at nothing to win a competition, even if it means he has to read a book or 10.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Reads a Book

episodes.synopsis: Henry's never been much good at tidying up, but there are all sorts of ways to get things done -- especially when you're as clever as he is.
episodes.title: Horrid Henry Tidies Up
